title: Hands-on: Corsair K70 Rapidfire RGB (Gaming, Lighting, and Switch sounds)
description:
We discuss our thoughts and impressions on the Corsair K70 Rapidfire keyboard from Corsair, then take it for a spin through Minecraft, Orcs Must Die! Unchained, and more. 

For more gaming news and hardware reviews, subscribe to us and check out http://GameCrate.com

Shop for the K70 Rapidfire RGB on Newegg: http://ow.ly/4mV8zG

Read the full review on GameCrate: http://ow.ly/4mV9tx

Intro music by Random aka Mega Ran (http://megaran.com) 

End slate song: Ready by Meganeko
https://meganeko.bandcamp.com/

Newegg Inc. provides the information contained herein as an educational service. Although we believe the information in this presentation to be accurate and timely, because of the rapid changes in the industry and our reliance on information provided by outside sources, we make no warranty or guarantee concerning the accuracy or reliability of the content or other material which we may reference.
